text: you broke and shattered a lot of girls
he slid his ungloved hand up my leg
those treatments were pathetically
veiled sexual abuse Larry Nasser is a
master manipulator his conniving and
calculating behavior not only tricked me
but he tricked my mom who was present
for all my appointments as a minor Timmy
who is like a knight in shining armor
but alas that shine blinded me from the
abuse he betrayed my trust
took advantage of my youth and sexually
abused me hundreds of times stole and
2009 she took her own life anymore it'll
be ten years of March I lost my baby she
was 23 years old she was 33 know every
day every day it all started with him
Nasser then told my dad hey he had to
massage my ankle and it would be okay
for him to wait in the waiting room
after he left NASA are told the medical
student to leave the room too after the
room was clear he did it yet again he
slipped he slid his ungloved hand up my
leg and back into the most innocent part
of my body and I felt searing pain the
pain of the abuse continues to make me
feel broken and secure fearful and
overall worthless at times these
feelings become completely overwhelming
but I engaged in self-destructive
behavior and thought about killing
myself
you broke and shattered a lot of girls
you manipulated us to trust you because
you're a doctor and doctors do no wrong
only heal you are not a healer
well Larry I'm here not to tell someone
but to tell everyone
and now as the only non-medical victim
to come forward I testified to let the
world know that you are a repulsive liar
and that those treatments were
pathetically veiled
sexual abuse perhaps you have figured it
out by now
the little girls don't stay little
forever they grow into strong women that
return to destroy your world
